EmailTemplate.name: ENG-VDI-Nurture.ENG-VDI-Early-01.01-n-Dimension-e-book
EmailTemplate.subject: Is Your Datacenter Beyond Human Control?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic_The-Desired-State.pdf?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Early01]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your data center is more complex than you give it credit for. With a multitude of resources (CPU, RAM, IOPs, NetIO, Balloon, Swap, Buffer, Flow...) whose utilization can assume innumerably varied states affecting performance, how do you find a state that satisfies all of the inherent tradeoffs? What about when we add public and private cloud deployments, containers or webscale application architectures? All of these tradeoffs combine to create an n-dimensional problem whose solution is far beyond human scale. How can we, as human beings, solve this problem?
<[[http://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic_The-Desired-State.pdf?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Early01]]> -The Turbonomic Team
